{"id":302652585,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1581517896,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"164 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/302652585/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"16.5 MB","code":"# https://leetcode.com/problems/max-area-of-island/\n\nclass Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid):\n        if not grid:\n            return 0\n        R, C = len(grid), len(grid[0])\n        self.area = 0\n        def dfs(y, x):\n            grid[y][x] = 0\n            self.area += 1\n            for ny, nx in [[y+1, x], [y-1, x], [y, x+1], [y, x-1]]:\n                if 0 <= ny and ny < R and 0 <= nx and nx < C and grid[ny][nx] == 1:\n                    dfs(ny, nx)\n                    \n        ans = 0\n        for r in range(R):\n            for c in range(C):\n                if grid[r][c] != 1:\n                    continue\n                self.area = 0\n                dfs(r, c)\n                ans = max(ans, self.area)\n        return ans\n                    \n        \n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
